name: bookstack
description: BookStack is an easy-to-use self-hosted documentation platform. It allows users to organize content in a structured hierarchy using books, chapters, and pages, and comes with markdown support, permissions, and a WYSIWYG editor.
features: Structured Documentation: Organize content in books, chapters, and pages. Logical hierarchy.
WYSIWYG Editor: Rich text editing with visual interface. Easy formatting.
Markdown Support: Write in markdown for faster documentation. Flexible authoring.
Permission System: Control access with granular permissions. Secure collaboration.
Search Functionality: Powerful search across all documentation. Find anything instantly.
Version History: Track changes and restore previous versions. Never lose work.
Multi-User: Team collaboration with role-based access. Work together.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your documentation. Data ownership.
